name: The Influence of the Black Arts Movement on Asian-American Identity
name_original: The Influence of the Black Arts Movement on Asian-American Identity
description: This game puts you in the perspective of an Asian-American college student in 1968. It tells a historical narrative from a fictional character's perspective in order to highlight the way the Black Arts Movement and Black Power Movement influenced other civil rights movements such as those centered around Asian-Americans and their identities.
